dcterms:description: A simulated dataset containing 998,807 claims with occurrence dates between years 1994 and 2005, used to evaluate the performance of the individual loss reserving model.
dcterms:title: Simulated dataset

dcterms:description: A real general insurance individual claims dataset provided by a Canadian insurance company, containing detailed information about bodily injury claims from January 1st, 2006 to August 31st, 2010.
dcterms:title: Real general insurance individual claims dataset
